# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a value for money. Considering its worth and benefits, I propose a price of $95 for this product. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a satisfaction guarantee. I believe this price reflects the value you'll receive and would be delighted if you choose to make this investment. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
